TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Matrix3D extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

summary.span: 表示用于三维空间转换的 4 x 4 矩阵。

span.span: Represents a 4 x 4 matrix used for transformations in 3-D space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有以下行向量语法： has the following row-vector syntax: ||||| |-|-|-|-| ||||| ||||| ||||| ||||| 请注意，由于第四列还可访问的因此矩阵将允许开发人员来表示仿射以及非仿射转换。Note that because the fourth column is also accessible, the matrix allows developers to represent affine as well as non-affine transforms. 矩阵可以追加或预置到其他矩阵。Matrices can be appended or prepended to other matrices. 将矩阵 A 追加到矩阵 B 表示转换按 B 和 a:Appending matrix A to matrix B denotes a transformation by B and then by A: ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

param.span: 要追加的矩阵。

span.span: Matrix to append.

summary.span: 在当前矩阵后面追加一个指定矩阵。

span.span: Appends a specified matrix to the current matrix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 矩阵可以追加或预置到其他矩阵。Matrices can be appended or prepended to other matrices. 将矩阵 A 追加到矩阵 B 表示转换按 B 和 a:Appending matrix A to matrix B denotes a transformation by B and then by A: ``` A(B(...)) ``` 前面添加 A 到 B 表示转换按 A 和 b:Prepending A to B denotes a transformation by A and then by B: ``` B(A(...)) ``` 若要转换点 P 按 A 和 B，请将 B 追加到 a:To transform point P by A and then by B, append B to A: ``` C = A.Append(B); P' = C.Transform(P); ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Identity As Matrix3D
public: static property System::Windows::Media::Media3D::Matrix3D Identity { System::Windows::Media::Media3D::Matrix3D get(); };

summary.span: 将 结构更改为单位 。

span.span: Changes a structure into an identity .

value.span: 单位 Matrix3D。

span.span: The identity Matrix3D.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中某标识矩阵，所有系数都均为 [1，1] 除 0 [2，2] [3，3] [4，4] 设置为 1 的系数。In an identity matrix, all coefficients are 0 except the [1,1][2,2][3,3][4,4] coefficients, which are set to 1. 标识矩阵很特殊，，因为如果它应用于顶点，他们就是不变。The identity matrix is special in that when it is applied to vertices, they are unchanged. 标识矩阵用作修改顶点值创建旋转、 翻译和任何其他可表示的 4 x 4 矩阵的转换矩阵的起始点。The identity matrix is used as the starting point for matrices that modify vertex values to create rotations, translations, and any other transformations that can be represented by a 4x4 matrix.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Invert() cil managed

summary.span: 反转此 结构。

span.span: Inverts this structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定是否可逆转 Matrix3D 结构，请阅读其属性。To determine whether a Matrix3D structure is invertible, read its property.

exception.span: 如果不能反转该矩阵，将引发 InvalidOperationException。

span.span: Throws InvalidOperationException if the matrix is not invertible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中某标识矩阵，所有系数都均为 [1，1] 除 0 [2，2] [3，3] [4，4] 设置为 1 的系数。In an identity matrix, all coefficients are 0 except the [1,1][2,2][3,3][4,4] coefficients, which are set to 1. 标识矩阵很特殊，，因为如果它应用于顶点，他们就是不变。The identity matrix is special in that when it is applied to vertices, they are unchanged. 标识矩阵用作修改顶点值创建旋转、 翻译和任何其他可表示的 4 x 4 矩阵的转换矩阵的起始点。The identity matrix is used as the starting point for matrices that modify vertex values to create rotations, translations, and any other transformations that can be represented by a 4x4 matrix.

param.name: matrix1
param.span: 要比较的第一个矩阵。

span.span: The first matrix to compare.

param.span: 要比较的第二个矩阵。

span.span: The second matrix to compare.

summary.span: 比较两个 实例是否完全相等。

span.span: Compares two instances for exact equality.

returns.span: 指示两个矩阵实例是否相等的 。

span.span: that indicates whether the two matrix instances are equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，双精度值可以获取错误运算时，以便逻辑上相等的两个值之间的精确比较可能会失败。Note that double values can acquire error when operated upon, so that an exact comparison between two values that are logically equal may fail. 此外，使用此相等运算符，Double.NaN 不等于其自身。Furthermore, using this equality operator, Double.NaN is not equal to itself.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetIdentity() cil managed

summary.span: 将此 结构更改为恒等矩阵。

span.span: Changes this structure into an identity matrix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中某标识矩阵，所有系数都均为 [1，1] 除 0 [2，2] [3，3] [4，4] 设置为 1 的系数。In an identity matrix, all coefficients are 0 except the [1,1][2,2][3,3][4,4] coefficients, which are set to 1. 标识矩阵很特殊，，因为如果它应用于顶点，他们就是不变。The identity matrix is special in that when it is applied to vertices, they are unchanged. 标识矩阵用作修改顶点值创建旋转、 翻译和任何其他可表示的 4 x 4 矩阵的转换矩阵的起始点。The identity matrix is used as the starting point for matrices that modify vertex values to create rotations, translations, and any other transformations that can be represented by a 4x4 matrix.
